main.docTitle: Carrying of Identity Cards (Frontier Closed Area and Mai Po Bird Sanctuary) Order

section.name: s1
section.heading: Citation
section.content: This order may be cited as the Carrying of Identity Cards (Frontier Closed Area and Mai Po Bird Sanctuary) Order.

section.name: s2
section.heading: Duty to carry identity card
section.leadIn: Every person who is the holder of an identity card shall carry on his person his identity card when entering or leaving, or while in—

paragraph.name: a
paragraph.content: the area declared to be a closed area by the Frontier Closed Area Order (Cap. 245 sub. leg. A); or (E.R. 3 of 2019)

paragraph.name: b
paragraph.content: the area commonly known as the Mai Po Bird Sanctuary and more particularly described in Area B in Schedule 6 to the Wild Animals Protection Ordinance (Cap. 170). (77 of 1996 s. 21)
